This format defines the layout for the initial funnelback search page
This format defines the layout for the funnelback search results
This format defines the layout for the page returned when no results are found
This is the default format for all results in the list if they do not have a customised format
This format defines how the featured results are to be displayed.
This is the layout of how the fluster results looks.
This is the layout of how each fluster element looks.
This is the layout of how the fluster navigation looks.
This is the layout of how the spelling suggestion looks.
This is the customised layout for the %s type formats.
Enter a file type (eg. pdf, html, doc) to use the customised format for that file type. File types can be exposed by result_type keyword
